text: The Memorial Park Complex of the Heroes of the First World War is a cemetery in Moscow, Russia. The cemetery opened in 1915 but was demolished during the Soviet period in 1932. In 2004 the new memorial park was built on the land of the former cemetery. == Gallery == file:Main alley of the Memorial park (Moscow).JPG|The main path in the memorial park file:Aviators graves.jpg|The Russian Air Force section file:Leningrad Cinema (Moscow).JPG|The "Leningrad Cinema" that was built on the cemetery area in the soviet period == Panorama view == == Other websites == Category:Buildings and structures in Moscow Category:National cemeteries Category:Military monuments and memorials
title: World War I Memorial Cemetery (Russia)
